resources.string: We have all been in a situation of not able to find the best source to prepare for any subject. \nIt is either due to lack of communication or the unique preferences we all have.
Pleasure to have your interest in helping \nout your peers!

There are ways you can upload a book or any source
 of Info. 
	1. You can upload just the name of the book. 
	2. You can upload the book itself locally.

There are ways to share the book you
 found apt for this subject. 
Here you can browse the book 
 or choose among the widely accepted ones.
Rating a book involves sharing your opinion

Not all resources provided here is perfect. 
 With the information you are providing, we can confidently tell that it is close to being perfect. 
 Please enter the Name of the book, a short description on your opinion of the book, an image of the book, and your rating. 
 If possible even the file itself.
